description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Continue From Wave To Wave Using Millions Of Upgrades To These Guns At Your Disposal Ending Swarms Of Zombie' Lives! If You Every Feel Overwhelmed; Just Hire Tim! Tim The Gunsman Will Rebuild Barriers For You  To Keep You Safe! Just Don't Have Too Many Close Calls Or You May Have To Hire Tim's Lesser Brother Tim instead...
